statements: SELECT * FROM comedy_podcast_data;
SELECT episode_title, release_date FROM comedy_podcast_data WHERE downloads > 1000;
SELECT * FROM comedy_podcast_data WHERE release_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT listener_demographic, COUNT(*) AS total_episodes FROM comedy_podcast_data GROUP BY listener_demographic;
SELECT episode_title, release_date, downloads FROM comedy_podcast_data ORDER BY downloads DESC, release_date ASC;
SELECT episode_title, release_date FROM comedy_podcast_data WHERE downloads > 1000 ORDER BY release_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM comedy_podcast_data WHERE listener_demographic = 'Female' ORDER BY episode_title ASC
SELECT episode_id, episode_title FROM comedy_podcast_data WHERE downloads BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT episode_title, listener_demographic FROM comedy_podcast_data WHERE listener_demographic IN ('Teen', 'Young Adult') ORDER BY episode_id
SELECT episode_title, downloads FROM comedy_podcast_data WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY downloads DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM episode_downloads;
SELECT episode_id, download_count FROM episode_downloads WHERE listener_id = 1;
SELECT listener_id, location FROM listener_demographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM episode_downloads WHERE download_count BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT episode_id, listener_id, download_count FROM episode_downloads ORDER BY download_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM episode_downloads WHERE download_count > 10 ORDER BY download_count DESC
SELECT listener_id, COUNT(*) AS total_downloads FROM episode_downloads GROUP BY listener_id HAVING total_downloads > 5

SELECT e.episode_id, l.listener_id, e.download_count, l.age, l.gender, l.location FROM episode_downloads e INNER JOIN listener_demographics l ON e.listener_id = l.listener_id WHERE l.age > 25 AND l.gender = 'Female' ORDER BY e.download_count DESC

SELECT e.episode_id, l.listener_id, e.download_count, l.age, l.gender, l.location FROM episode_downloads e INNER JOIN listener_demographics l ON e.listener_id = l.listener_id WHERE l.location LIKE '%USA%' AND e.download_count BETWEEN 5 AND 15

SELECT e.episode_id, l.listener_id, e.download_count, l.age, l.gender, l.location FROM episode_downloads e INNER JOIN listener_demographics l ON e.listener_id = l.listener_id WHERE l.gender = 'Male' AND e.download_count > 20 ORDER BY l.age ASC
SELECT * FROM episode_downloads;
SELECT episode_id, download_count FROM episode_downloads ORDER BY download_count DESC;
SELECT episode_id, download_count FROM episode_downloads WHERE listener_id = 123;
SELECT episode_title, release_date FROM podcast_episodes WHERE release_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT listener_id, age, gender FROM listener_demographics WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT episode_id, episode_title, release_date FROM podcast_episodes WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT episode_title, episode_duration FROM podcast_episodes ORDER BY episode_duration DESC;
SELECT episode_id, download_count, listener_id, download_timestamp FROM episode_downloads WHERE download_count > 100 ORDER BY download_count DESC;
SELECT listener_id, age, gender, location FROM listener_demographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT episode_id, episode_title, release_date, episode_duration, download_count FROM podcast_episodes LEFT JOIN episode_downloads ON podcast_episodes.episode_id = episode_downloads.episode_id;
SELECT * FROM comedy_podcast_network;
SELECT episode_id, episode_title, downloads FROM comedy_podcast_network WHERE downloads > 1000;

SELECT episode_title, listener_demographics->'location' AS listener_location FROM comedy_podcast_network JOIN listener_demographics ON comedy_podcast_network.episode_id = listener_demographics.listener_id;
SELECT host_name, host_bio FROM podcast_hosts WHERE host_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT episode_id, total_downloads, total_listeners FROM episode_stats ORDER BY total_downloads DESC;
SELECT episode_title, downloads FROM comedy_podcast_network WHERE downloads > 1000 ORDER BY episode_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM listener_demographics WHERE location = 'New York' AND interests->'primary' = 'Comedy' ORDER BY listener_id DESC;
SELECT host_name, host_bio FROM podcast_hosts WHERE host_name LIKE '%Joe%' ORDER BY host_name;

SELECT e.episode_title, s.total_downloads, l.location FROM comedy_podcast_network e JOIN episode_stats s ON e.episode_id = s.episode_id JOIN listener_demographics l ON l.listener_id = 1 ORDER BY s.total_downloads DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT host_name, host_bio FROM comedy_podcast_network cn JOIN podcast_hosts ph ON cn.episode_id = ph.host_id ORDER BY host_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM episodes;
SELECT episode_title, release_date, duration_minutes FROM episodes;
SELECT listener_name, age, location FROM listeners;
SELECT podcast_title, host_name, category FROM podcasts;
SELECT episode_id, episode_title, release_date, duration_minutes, download_count FROM episodes;
SELECT episode_title, release_date FROM episodes ORDER BY release_date DESC, episode_title ASC
SELECT listener_name, location, age FROM listeners WHERE age >= 25 AND gender = 'Female' ORDER BY location
SELECT podcast_title, host_name, category FROM podcasts WHERE category IN ('Technology', 'Science')

SELECT listener_name, episode_title, download_date, listening_duration_minutes FROM listeners JOIN listeners_episodes ON listeners.listener_id = listeners_episodes.listener_id JOIN episodes ON listeners_episodes.episode_id = episodes.episode_id WHERE download_date >= '2021-01-01' AND listening_duration_minutes > 30
SELECT listener_id, COUNT(listener_id) AS total_listening FROM listeners_episodes GROUP BY listener_id HAVING COUNT(listener_id) > 3 ORDER BY total_listening DESC
